user_profile.name: Liang Zhang
user_profile.description: Liang Zhang is a 50-year-old technology consultant from Eastern Asia. With advanced technical expertise and extensive experience in navigating complex systems, he approaches tasks with a patient and analytical mindset, valuing direct communication while remaining very reserved in his expressiveness. Given his current urgency to arrange transportation to a clinic due to a pressing health matter, Liang is meticulously evaluating options that align with his very risk-averse nature, prioritizing safety and reliability.

instructions.dialogue: Be brief and direct, give minimal information.
instructions.profile: Only share profile information when specifically asked.
instructions.hidden_state: Express minimal emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Quick appointment scheduling for urgent medical needs
